law.catch_line: Attorney General's jurisdiction to enforce KRS 367.83801 to 367.83807.

text.section: The Attorney General shall have jurisdiction to enforce KRS 367.83801 to 367.83807, and may recover the reasonable costs of investigation and litigation.

If an act by a mold remediation company violates any provision of this chapter, the Attorney General may take civil action and seek any remedy provided in this chapter, including the recovery of the reasonable costs of investigation and litigation.

law.history: Created 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 89, sec. 4, effective July 15, 2010.
